meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Soumia Meiyappan Ted Dorsey Rachel Zoch Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7249.

td.p: Soumia Meiyappan, a research associate from Brampton, Ontario, Canada
Ted Dorsey, an author and educator from Los Angeles, California
Rachel Zoch, a writer and editor from Deer Park, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $17,500)

tr.td: CLEVER LOGOS
BOOK SONGS
ITALIAN, WITH THE SPEAKING
YOU GET 95 YEARS
TIME OFF
FOR GOOD BEHAVIOR

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_4', 'clue_J_5_4_stuck', '(Rachel: [No response])
(Alex: Oh. Word for lazy would be "idle". I-D-L-E. And the word we\'re going for here is I-D-Y-L-L. [*].)

idyll

Rachel
')

Virginia')

In the 1690s its legislature referred to this place as "his Majesty's ancient colony and dominion"
Rachel
Ted
Soumia

2nd place: $2,000
3rd place: $1,000
Rachel
Ted
Soumia

3 W
(including 1 DD)

5 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
